text: The General Died at Dawn is a 1936 American adventure drama movie directed by Lewis Milestone and starring Gary Cooper, Madeleine Carroll, Akim Tamiroff, Dudley Digges, Porter Hall, William Frawley, Philip Ahn. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 1937. ==Other websites== * * Category:1936 drama movies Category:1930s American adventure movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in China
title: The General Died at Dawn
